subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Despite all of the attention on Lance Armstrong, Levi Leipheimer feels that having one of the best cyclists in history as one of his worker bees will only help his chances at the Giro.
snippet: Despite all of the attention on Lance Armstrong, Levi Leipheimer feels that having one of the best cyclists in history as one of his worker bees will only help his chances at the Giro.
